name: Sukiyaki
ingredients: 1 lb beef tenderloin or sirloin steak 1 bunch green onions, cut into 1½-‐inch lengths
2 tbsp vegetable oil 2 large onions, thinly sliced
2 tbsp sugar 1 can (﴾5 oz)﴿ bamboo shoots, drained
steps: ½ cup beef broth 3 stalks celery, diagonally sliced
½ lb mushrooms, washed, trimmed, and thinly sliced 3 cups hot cooked rice
Cut tenderloin across the grain into ½-‐inch strips about 2 inches long. In large skillet, brown meat in oil. Push
meat to one section of skillet. Stir in beef broth, sugar, and soy sauce. Place mushrooms, green onions, onions,
celery add bamboo shoots in separate sections of skillet. (﴾Do not mix.)﴿ Cover; simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach;
simmer 5 minutes longer. Serve over rice. If desired, pass additional soy sauce. Serves 8.
